root.name: Söldner: Secret Wars
root.description: Söldner: Secret Wars is a tactical shooter set in modern times which was released for the PC. It has a strong focus on multiplayer and supports up to 128 players on certain servers. A standard match contains 32 players. The players can play as infantry or use land, air or sea vehicles. The player is also able to strongly customize its soldier by changing it'sclothes, weapons and weapon upgrades. Due to a decreasing number of players in the months after its release, Söldner was released as a free download in March 2006. Support continues until today with the latest patch being released in Octobre 2010.
